artist: Rory McEwen; Text by C. Oscar Moreton; Introduction by Sacheverell Sitwell; George Rainbird, Ltd., London; Chiswick Press, Charles Whittingham & Co., London
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: fabric with gold-stamped lettering, paper sides in collotype (flower designs); endpapers: collotype of flowers (brown ink) by Van Leer of Amsterdam (matches sides); type: Monotype Caslon Old Face; 62 pp.
title: Old Carnations and Pinks
